It will convene an event next month to bring together nonprofits and government researchers to discuss the opportunities and risks ahead.

articles.title: AmTrust Wins Celent Model Insurer Award for Digital Customer Experience
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: AmTrust Financial Services, Inc. has been recognized by Celent as a winner of a Model Insurer award for Digital Customer Experience. articles.title: Sam Altman says Meta tried to poach OpenAI staff with $100 million bonuses
articles.author: Aidin Vaziri
articles.summary: Sam Altman claims Meta is offering massive compensation packages to lure top artificial intelligence talent from OpenAI. So far, the effort hasn't worked. articles.title: China's MiniMax debuts M1 AI model that it says costs 200x less to train than OpenAI's GPT-4
articles.author: Alexandra Sternlicht
articles.summary: MiniMax's M1 AI model is competitive with top models from OpenAI, Anthropic, and DeepSeek, but dirt cheap to train and run. The company spent just $534,700 renting the data center computing resources needed to train M1. This is nearly 200x cheaper than estimates of the training cost of ChatGPT 4-o. OpenAI was on track to lose $14 billion in 2026 and was unlikely to break even until 2028.

articles.title: Sam Altman Says GPT-5 Coming This Summer, Open to Ads on ChatGPT—With a Catch

The announcement comes amid rising competition in the AI arena and growing scrutiny over how these tools are developed and deployed. Altman also talked about the possibility of ads on ChatGPT.

articles.title: A.I. in the Classroom: A Brave New World?

Carl Murray believes students should approach A.I. not as a replacement for thought but as a reflective partner in their learning.

articles.title: Citi's 'accelerating' its AI strategy with new leaders. Here's how they're readying the firm for a new future.

articles.title: The ‘OpenAI Files' push for oversight in the race to AGI

The goal of the Files is to propose a path forward for AI leaders that focuses on responsible governance, ethical leadership and shared benefits.

articles.title: Futureproof

articles.summary: AI tools are flooding the culture ecosystem and no corner of the arts space is immune.
